creditline: Gift of Michael Engel in memory of Celia Engel
markings: [15] and [TK], stamped on back; crown above [TK] with another illegible line of text below stamp, in green, on back; [Karlsbad], in gilt, above Hebrew on lower 'petal' on front
text: This Seder plate was owned by a German Jewish couple who escaped from Germany in 1938 to Shanghai, China. They subsequently immigrated to the United States, where the donor obtained the plate from them.
title: Seder plate
